languages.text: "Боль, агония, страх, безумие... Что за чудный коктейль из страданий мы пропустили!"
"Pain, agony, fear, madness... What a wonderful cocktail of suffering — and we missed it!"
languages.original_text: "Боль, агония, страх, безумие... Что за чудный коктейль из страданий мы пропустили!"

traits.locale_text: "Pain, agony, fear, madness... What a wonderful cocktail of suffering, and we missed it!"
"Pain, agony, fear, madness... What a wonderful cocktail of suffering, and we missed it!"
"Pain, agony, fear, madness... What a wonderful cocktail of suffering — and we missed it!"
"Pain, agony, fear, madness... What a wonderful cocktail of suffering — and we missed it!"
"Pain, agony, fear, madness... What a wonderful cocktail of suffering — and we missed it!"
"Pain, agony, fear, madness... What a wonderful cocktail of suffering — and we missed it!"

languages.text: “折磨、尖叫、恐惧、疯狂……多么美妙的痛苦鸡尾酒啊！可我们却没赶上！”
languages.original_text: "Pain, agony, fear, madness... What a wonderful cocktail of suffering — and we missed it!"

traits.locale_text: “折磨、尖叫、恐惧、疯狂……多么美妙的痛苦鸡尾酒啊！可我们却没赶上！”

languages.text: "Schmerz, Qual, Furcht, Wahnsinn ... Welch wunderbarer Cocktail des Leids — und wir haben es verpasst!"
languages.original_text: "Pain, agony, fear, madness... What a wonderful cocktail of suffering — and we missed it!"

traits.locale_text: "Schmerz, Qual, Furcht, Wahnsinn ... Welch wunderbarer Cocktail des Leids — und wir haben es verpasst!"

languages.text: «Dolor, agonía, miedo, locura... ¡Qué maravilloso cóctel de sufrimiento... y nos lo hemos perdido!».
languages.original_text: "Pain, agony, fear, madness... What a wonderful cocktail of suffering — and we missed it!"

traits.locale_text: «Dolor, agonía, miedo, locura... ¡Qué maravilloso cóctel de sufrimiento... y nos lo hemos perdido!».

languages.text: « Violence, douleur, peur, folie... Un merveilleux cocktail de souffrance. Dire que nous avons raté ça ! »
languages.original_text: "Pain, agony, fear, madness... What a wonderful cocktail of suffering — and we missed it!"

traits.locale_text: « Violence, douleur, peur, folie... Un merveilleux cocktail de souffrance. Dire que nous avons raté ça !"

languages.text: 「痛み、苦しみ、恐怖、狂気...。なんと素晴らしい苦痛のカクテルだろう。それを見逃すとは！」
languages.original_text: "Pain, agony, fear, madness... What a wonderful cocktail of suffering — and we missed it!"

traits.locale_text: 「痛み、苦しみ、恐怖、狂気...。なんと素晴らしい苦痛のカクテルだろう。それを見逃すとは！」

languages.text: "Keder, ızdırap, korku, delilik... Ne kadar harika bir acı kokteyli. Biz ise bunu kaçırdık!"
languages.original_text: "Pain, agony, fear, madness... What a wonderful cocktail of suffering — and we missed it!"

traits.locale_text: "Keder, ızdırap, korku, delilik... Ne kadar harika bir acı kokteyli. Biz ise bunu kaçırdık!"
